cast.name: 克里斯蒂娜·阿奎莱拉 Christina Aguilera
多纳泰拉·范思哲 Donatella Versace

this_title: Christina Aguilera: Stripped Live in the UK
introduction: Exclusive interview with Christina about her album STRIPPED,the STRIPPED tour,and her life and causes outside of music..An introduction to the supporting cast.Meet the musicians,dancers,stylists,and choreographers who help Christina put on her dazzling show every night.."Gilbert's Bus Tour"-Take a tour of Christina's tour bus with backup dancer Gilberto Saldivar.."One Night In Milano"-Christina meets up with Donatella Versace in Milan,the fashion capital of the world.."RSVP"-Christina answers questions directly from her fans.01. DIRRTY02. GET MINE,GET YOURS03. THE VOICE WITHIN04. GENIE IN A BOTTLE05. CAN'T HOLD US DOWN(Featuring Lil'Kim)06. CONTIGO EN LA DISTANCIA/FALSAS ESPERANZAS07. INFATUATION08. COME ON OVER(All I Want Is You)09. CRUZ10. IMPOSSIBLE11. AT LAST12. LADY MARMALADE13. WALK AWAY14. FIGHTER15. WHAT A GIRL WANTS16. BEAUTIFUL
chinese_title: Christina Aguilera: Stripped Live in the UK
